name: Ostatni Dzien w Pracy
description:
Your "dear" Employer Tricked You.

You work hard from dawn to dusk, without free weekend , no bonus, no raise.
And finally you find that you become demoted to the lowest position.
Of course, with an even smaller payout because the boss's daughter takes over your work
It's time to take control of the situation.
Outsmart all your employees, security guards and security systems to your boss's miser corporation to fall.
  • 21 Levels,
  • 2 difficulty modes,
  • More than 40 useful items,
  • Over 50 objects to demolition.
